Package Photos.controller

Class Album_Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Photos.controller.Controller_Base
      • Photos.controller.Album_Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<javafx.scene.control.Tab>, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>, Controller_Interface

    public class Album_Controller
extends Controller_Base
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>, javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<javafx.scene.control.Tab>, Controller_Interface
    This class represents all the functionality an album has
    Author:
    Dhruvil Shah, Drashti Mehta
